come back a little later.

208851.「個人が 獲得した勝ち点の ランキングじゃ。\n<break>:
The ranking of the points won by an

208852.「開催中の 対抗戦では\n このような順位になっておるぞ。\n<end>:
The ranking is as follows in the ongoing
competition.
<end>

208854.「バトルトリニティとは……\n １チーム５人の クラブ別の３勢力に分かれ\n ジ:
Battle Trinity is a competition in which each team of five players is divided into three clubs to compete for Jewels. The players
choose their vocation before the game and try to collect as many Jewels as possible by taking advantage of the characteristics of
each vocation while fighting against the enemy. The Jewels collected will be brought back to your team's Trirock, and you will
score points. Also, the number of Trirocks occupied will be added to the score after the game. The club with the most points wins the
game. It is a casual game played by a large number of players... but it is still a traditional game. It is said to have its
origins in the Mythical Age.

208855.「職業ランクとは……バトルトリニティの\n 競技用に使える職業の 熟練度のことじ:
There are three levels of vocation ranks. The contribution in a match will be accumulated as skill points, and the vocation rank will be
increased. When your vocation rank reaches the maximum, you will receive special rewards and medals, so it is a good idea to raise your
rank as you go. However... even if your rank increases, your strength in a match will not change. Make no mistake about it.

208856.「練習試合とは……\n その名の通り 練習として\n 気楽に バトルトリニティを:
Practice Match is, as the name suggests, a mode that allows you to play Battle Trinity as a casual practice game. You can choose to
participate in a match either with your own club or with any club. In "My Club", you join your own club and participate in the match.
When you are in a party, only the leader of the party can apply to participate in the game as the leader's club. In the case of "Any
Club," you will join the team of the club you are in at the time, which often speeds up the matching process.

208857.「はるか神話の時代……\n アストルティアには 雲に届くほど巨大な\n ５匹の霊:
Long, long ago, during the Mythical Age of Astoltia, there existed five sacred beasts so large that they could reach the clouds...
These beasts had a spirit for combat, and the five fought one another often. Each time, the mountains and islands vanished in their wake.
The Goddess could bear this no longer. She said...
"If this continues, this land will cease to exist. I shall bestow upon you a place to do battle."
And so, the Goddess prepared a place where the five could fight. Furthermore, only three were allowed to do battle at a time.
They competed based on the points they earned and the jewels they collected... And thus, the rules were established.
So, do you understand...? This tradition has been passed down, refined into a sport that we call Battle Trinity.
The warriors of Battle Trinity who fight and collect jewels seem to give off bursts of light... Thus, we call them "athlights".

208858.「模擬戦とは 対戦相手を指定して\n バトルトリニティの試合を行うことが\n で:
A simulation match is a Battle Trinity match in which you can select an opponent. You can start a match by entering a simulation through
your club's agent or by selecting an opponent. You can only start a simulation match when all three parties are present. Also note that
matches cannot be played between members of the same club. There are no restrictions on party members, so you can play irregular
matches. Remember, no achievements or medals will be unlocked, and no vocation experience or reward items will be gained during a
simulation match.

208859.<select_se_off>\nバトルトリニティとは\n練習試合とは\n職業ラ:
<select_se_off>
About Battle Trinity
About Practice Game
About Vocation Rank
<select_end>
<break>

208861.「ジュエルとは その名の通り かがやく宝石。\n 戦場に 落ちているジュエルを:
Jewels are, as the name suggests, dazzling jewels. Each player can have up to five Jewels at a time, but be careful not to lose them all
if you are killed by the enemy.

208862.「トライロックとは…… 集めたジュエルを\n 納める チームの拠点となる場所じゃ:
Trirocks are the team's base to store the collected Jewels. 7 Trirocks are located on the battlefield... you must occupy them to use
them, so you must occupy them as often as you can. You can occupy an unoccupied Trirock by entering the area and building up your Occupy
Gauge. If there are players from other clubs, the gauge will stop, so be careful. If there is a Trirock from another club, you can reduce
the gauge by entering the area. When the gauge is depleted, you can return to neutral status. Whenever you deliver Jewel to Trirock, you
will gain experience, and if the experience is more than a certain amount, Trirock's level will increase. At the end of the game, you
will receive bonus points according to your Trirock's level, so make sure you are not the last one to be taken.

208863.「戦士 魔法使い 武闘家 盗賊など\n いくつかある 職業の中から\n 試合前に:
You can choose your vocation before the match from among several vocations such as warrior mage martial artist thief, etc. Each vocation
allows you to use skills for competitions and to change your status, such as the speed of movement. You can learn more about the
characteristics of the game by playing it. Also, by picking up Jewel or occupying Trirock, you can gain experience and grow
during the game. If you can level up before the other players, you will have a big advantage... so be aware of it and fight. Be
careful, however, that this level does not carry over to the next match, as it will only be used by Demon during the match.

208864.「モンスターのチカラを秘めた 玉のことじゃな。\n この援軍玉は バトルトリニテ:
Reinforcement Orbs are balls that contain the power of monsters. Reinforcement Orbs can be found during Battle Trinity matches, and each
player can only have one Reinforcement Orb, which can only be used in Trirock, but each one is very powerful. If you defeat another
player with a Reinforcement Orb, you can take it from him or her before he or she can use it in Trirock. One thing to note is that the
Reinforcement Orb disappears after a certain amount of time in your possession. Therefore, it is best to use it as soon as possible.

208865.「ボーナスジュエルとは 試合中に入手できる\n レアなジュエルでな。トライロック:
Bonus Jewels are rare Jewels that can be obtained during a match, and if they are delivered to Trirock, they will be appraised
after the match and a reward will be given. The reward is available to everyone on the same team, so if you find a Bonus Jewel, you
are encouraged to give it to Trirock. However, please note that you will not receive a reward if your contribution in the game is less than
300 points. Also, there is a limit to the number of Bonus Jewels you can receive depending on your ranking in the game. The
more you win, the more you will receive. Specifically...if you finish first, you will receive a maximum of five rewards, and if you
finish second or third, you will receive a maximum of three rewards.

Hohoho...
I'll always be watching over you. May the
glory of victory shine upon you.
<end>

Is there anything else I can do?
<break>

210500.不明なエラーが発生しました。\nしばらく時間をおいてから\n再度お試しください。:
An unknown error has occurred. Please wait a
moment and try again.
<end>

210526.ここから 対抗戦の結果が\n確認できそうだ。\n<break>:
You can check the results of the competition
here.
<break>

210527.バトルトリニティの優勝国に 贈呈される\n立派なトロフィーだ。\n<break>:
It is a magnificent trophy presented to the
winning country of Battle Trinity.
<break>

211017.「対抗戦とは…… バトルトリニティならではの\n クラブ同士の威信をかけた 大会:
The Battle Trinity is a prestige competition between the clubs. It will be held periodically for a limited period of time.
Winning a match in a Rivalry Tournament earns the winning club points. The club with the most points by the end of the period is the
winner.

211018.「対抗戦に参加するには エントリー期間内に\n おぬしの所属する クラブのエージ:
To participate in the competition, you must apply for entry through your club's agent during the entry period. Entry can be made at
any time from the preparation period to the competition period. Once you have paid the entry fee, you may participate in the
competition as many times as you like, as long as you do not change clubs.

211019.「対抗戦で 優秀な戦績を収めた 閃手には\n 参加費として集めた ゴールドが 授:
The athlights who excel in the Battle Trinity competition are awarded with the Gold that was collected for the entry fee.
The more participants that entered, the more prize money there is to go around.
Prize money will be awarded regardless of club status, and will be given to the top 200 ranked athlights.
Starting with the 4th competition, an additional 1 million Gold will be added to the prize pool.
However, ranking is decided on a first-come first-serve basis. If multiple athlights have the same points, those who ranked first
will be ranked higher.
Even if you don't rank in the top 200, I will still award a prize to each member of the competition's winning club.
You have until the next preparation period to receive any prize money. Be sure not to forget to speak with me.

211020.「ランキングには ３種類ある。\n クラブランキング。閃手ランキング。\n 優勝:
There are three types of ranking. Club ranking, player ranking, and player ranking within a club at the time of the championship.
The club ranking is the ranking of the total number of points won by the five clubs at that time. player ranking is the ranking of the
player who has the most points against one club, regardless of the club he belongs to. In the player ranking, the top 200 players with
the most points against the winning club will be listed and their names will be engraved in the Trophy.

211021.「移籍とは 現在所属しているクラブではない\n 別のクラブに 入団しなおすことじ:
A transfer is the process of rejoining a club other than the one you are currently a member of. You can transfer as many times as you like
as long as you are eligible to do so. However, there is a caveat when transferring. If you want to participate in a match after
transferring, you must pay the participation fee again. Also, be aware that you will not be able to transfer to another club between
tournaments and the off-season... in other words, until the next preparation period.

212059.「むう……対抗戦は\n 今 開催されていないので 教えられんのじゃ。\n<br>:
I can't tell you about the competition since it is not being held right now. For now, it would be a good idea to practice and improve
your skills in preparation for the competition.

212687.「何について 聞きたいのじゃ？\n<break>: What do you want to talk about?<break>

212822.「バトルトリニティは ３つの勢力で 得点を競い\n いちばん 多くの得点を 稼い:
In Battle Trinity, three groups from different
clubs do battle to compete for points. The
club with the most points will win.
<bw_break>

212824.「得点を稼ぐには ジュエルという宝石を集めて\n 古戦場に ７つある トライロッ:
To earn points, you must collect the Jewels
scattered around the battlefield, and deposit
them into the large crystals called Trirocks.
<bw_break>

212826.「ジュエルには いろんな種類があって\n めずらしい色や形だと 高い得点になるん:
There are many types of Jewels to collect.
The larger and more unique-shaped ones are
worth more points.
<bw_break>

212828.「中には 試合後に 報酬が手に入る\n ボーナスジュエル なんてものもあるぞい。:
There's even one called a Bonus Jewel, which
will earn you rewards after the battle is
over. Be sure to pick them up!
<bw_break>

212830.「トライロックは 古戦場に ７つある。\n ジュエルを納めるには チームの拠点と:
There are seven Trirocks total. Your club must
control a Trirock in order to deposit any
Jewels into it.
<bw_break>

212832.「占領するには 一定時間 トライロックのそばで\n 待っているだけでよい。占領し:
To capture a Trirock, all you need to do is
stand close to it for a short while. After
that, you can deposit Jewels into it.
<bw_break>

212834.「占領したトライロックは 守っていないと\n 敵に奪われたりするぞ。試合後に 占:
Trirocks can be taken by opposing clubs if you do not defend them. You will earn points at the end of the game based on the number
of Trirocks you control, so it's very important to protect them.

212836.「他のクラブよりも たくさんのジュエルを集め\n 多くのトライロックを占領して:
Collecting and depositing more Jewels as well
as controlling more Trirocks than your
opponents is the key to victory.
<bw_break>

212838.「それと 古戦場では ジュエルとは別の\n 特別な玉が 見つかることがあるんじゃ:
In addition to Jewels, you may find special
orbs. Allow me to explain what they are.
<bw_break>

212840.「まずは お助けモンスターを呼ぶ 援軍玉じゃ。\n 使用すると モンスターがあら:
The first is called a Reinforcement Orb. This
will call in a monster that will help your
club when you use it.
<bw_break>

212842.「次は ジュエル得点がふえる 撃破玉。\n 相手を倒すと １つもらえ 個数に応じ:
Next is called an Attack Orb. This increases
the amount of Jewel Points you'll earn when
depositing your Jewels.
<bw_break>

212844.「これらの玉を うまく使いこなせれば\n より勝利に近づくじゃろう。くわしい内容:
Be sure to use these orbs well, as doing so
can lead to victory. If you'd like to know
more about them, choose "Explanation".
<bw_break>

212848.「最後に 職業についてじゃな。\n バトルトリニティでは 競技用となる\n ４つ:
Lastly, there are four different vocations to
choose from in Battle Trinity.
<bw_break>

212850.「戦士は 高いＨＰと 防御力をそなえた\n クラブの盾役じゃ。占領したトライロッ:
Warriors are your shields, with high HP and
defensive abilities. They excel at protecting
controlled Trirocks and their companions.
<bw_break>

212852.「魔法使いは うたれ弱いが 強力な範囲魔法で\n 相手を 一掃することができるん:
Mages are frail, but can easily defeat their
opponents with their powerful magic. Be
sure to keep ample eyes on your surroundings.
<bw_break>

212854.「武闘家は すばやい連撃と 範囲攻撃をもち\n めいそうで 自分を回復できる万能:
Martial Artists are versatile fighters, having a quick multi-hitting attack, a wide-range attack, and the ability to heal themselves.
You can expect them to do well in most situations.

212856.「盗賊は 戦闘は苦手じゃが 素早さがウリじゃ。\n 戦いを避け たくさんジュエル:
Thieves are not great in combat, but they are very quick on their feet. They can avoid fighting with ease and contribute to
victory by collecting many Jewels.

212858.「さて いろいろと説明したが 競技を覚えるなら \n 実際にやってみるのが 早か:
I know I've explained a lot, but the best way
to learn to play is to give it a try yourself.
Well? Are you ready?
<yesno>
<case 1>
<close>
<case 2>
<break>
<case_cancel>
<break>
<case_end>

212909.「ほう…… 勉強熱心なことじゃ。\n もう一度 遊び方を おさらいしたいのじゃな:
My...how studious you must be.
Would you like me to explain to you how
to play once more?
<yesno 2><break>

215309.「ただし せっかく手に入れた ジュエルも\n トライロックに納めなければ 得点に:
However, Jewels you pick up must be placed
in a Trirock you control. Otherwise, you won't
get any points.
<bw_break>

215911.「試合中 ジュエルを持った敵を倒すと\n 撃破玉というものを 入手できるんじゃ。:
If you defeat an enemy with Jewel during a match, you can get an Attack Orb. You can have up to 3 Attack Orbs, which are used
automatically when you deliver a Jewel with an Attack Orb in your hand. You will score points according to the number of Attack Orbs you had
when you delivered the Jewel. Also, be careful not to fall down while you are holding the Attack Orb, because you will lose the Attack
Orb.

215937.「フォフォフォ……あせるでない。\n まだ 対抗戦は はじまったばかりじゃから\:
Fofofo...don't panic. We can't show you the standings yet because the tournament has just started. We will be able to show you the
standings in the second half of the season, when the tournament will have reached its conclusion, so come back then.

215939.「対抗戦も もうじき 終わるのう……。\n というわけで 対抗戦が終わるまで\n:
The rivalry will soon be over, so I've decided not to tell you the standings until the tournament is over. You think I'm being mean?
That's the way to make the games more exciting.

215949.「フォフォフォ……。\n <%sM_Win_team>の クラブホームにある\n:
Hohoho... you would like to see the Winner's
Trophy at the <%sM_Win_team> Club Home?<yesno><break>

215953.「ほう……\n それでは <%sM_Win_team>の\n クラブホームへ 送:
Hmm.. Well then, I will return you to the
<%sM_Win_team> Club Home.
<end>

215967.「この前の対抗戦で\n <pc>が 獲得した勝ち点じゃ。\n<break>:
The points <pc> got in the last
round of the rivalry.
<break>

218647.「フォフォ…… あせるでない。\n 対抗戦の勝ち点を 集計してる最中じゃ。\n<:
Fofo... don't be hasty. We are in the process of tallying the points from the games. We'll have the results in a little while. Until
then, you can wait.

233817.「貢献度とは……\n どれだけ 勝利に貢献したかを表す 指標じゃ。\n<br>\:
Contribution is a measure of how much you have contributed to the victory. Contribution is earned by picking up Jewel or occupying
Trirock during a match. Contributions earned in a match will be accumulated in the form of Vocation Proficiency Points. In addition,
contributions earned during a match will be converted into Jewel Points that can be exchanged for limited-edition items.
However... if you score less than 100 points in a match, your contribution will be reduced to 0.

243193.「クラブボーナスとは 勝ち点の総計にかかる\n ボーナス倍率のことじゃ。倍率によ:
The Club Bonus is a bonus multiplier that is applied to the total number of points won. Depending on the multiplier, the number of
points won by the club will increase dramatically. However, the club bonus only affects the club ranking, not the player
ranking. The bonus multiplier is determined by the ratio of the number of games played by each club, so the fewer the number of games
played, the higher the multiplier. However, there is a limit to the bonus multiplier. The bonus multiplier is capped at the maximum
number of games played, so if the number of games is more than three, the multiplier cannot be higher. The bonus multiplier is
recalculated when the ranking is updated. The score in the ranking list is the number of points multiplied by the club bonus
multiplier. You can find out your club bonus by talking to your club's Agent. If you want to know the multiplier of other clubs, come to
me and I will tell you. Fofofofo...

245453.<select_se_off>\nクラブホームに戻る\n順位表\nクラブボーナス:
<select_se_off>
Return to Club Home

<select_end>
<break>

245454.「今回の クラブボーナス一覧じゃ。\n ちなみに おぬしは 現在\n <%sM_:
This is the Club Bonus list. By the way, you
currently belong to the
<%sM_team> club.
<break>

253506.「前半戦の間は 下位のクラブが\n 上位のクラブに 勝利したら\n 追加点を獲得:
During the first half of the tournament, the lower ranked clubs will get extra points for each win over the higher ranked clubs. 5th
place club will get 3 points for a win over the top 2 clubs, 4th and 3rd place clubs will get 2 points for a win over the top 2 clubs,
2nd place club will get 1 extra point for a win over 1st place club, and so on. The second place club will get an extra point for beating
the first place club. Note that this does not increase the number of individual points. Remember that from the second half of the
game, there will be no extra points.

253508.「貢献章という 新しい勲章が追加されたのじゃ。\n 所属クラブの勝ち点を １０点:
A new decoration, the Contribution Medal, has been added. You can earn a Contribution Medal by earning 10 points for your club. Players
who have earned a Contribution Medal will be rewarded. Don't forget to come to me after the match. This medal will be reset at the start
of the next tournament, so you can't set it. Just keep it.

257261.「できるだけ実力の近い 閃手同士が\n マッチングするように\n 内部レートが:
Internal rates have been introduced to match players as closely as possible. The rate changes as you win or lose. This rate is used
by Demon for matching, so it cannot be seen by players including yourself. When you are in a party, the highest rate in the party is used
for matching. Remember that the internal rate is irrelevant between 2:30 AM and 4:00 PM, when it is harder to get matched.

286708.「第６回から 部門賞が追加されたぞい。\n 対抗戦の様々な戦績を参照して 部門別:
The Trophy has been added to the 6th edition. We have decided to award trophies by category based on the various results of the
competition. There are currently five trophy categories: Strongest Player, Contribution, Score, Player, and Outnumber. The Strongest
Club Award will be given to the club with the highest winning percentage. The contribution award will be given to the club with the
highest number of times in the top 7 of the contribution ranking on the post-game results screen. The player award is given to the club
with the player with the most points per game. The player prize will be awarded to the club with the player who has the most points.
During the off-season, the trophies for each category will be placed on a pedestal behind the Agents. The trophies will remain there
from the time the results are announced until the next preparation period.
